# UICollectionView.SelfSizingInvalidation.disabled

**Case**

A mode that disables self-sizing invalidation.

## Declaration

```swift
case disabled
```

## Discussion

If you use this self-sizing invalidation mode, no sizing updates occur after calling [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/invalidateIntrinsicContentSize()] on a self-sizing cell or its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCell/contentView].

## Constants

- **UICollectionView.SelfSizingInvalidation.enabled**: A mode that enables manual self-sizing invalidation.
- **UICollectionView.SelfSizingInvalidation.enabledIncludingConstraints**: A mode that enables automatic self-sizing invalidation after Auto Layout changes.
